description:
Lee A. Ciccarelli founded Ciccarelli Law Offices as a personal injury and criminal defense law firm in 1999. We have since added many offices, including one in Coatesville, Pennsylvania. We have also added many practice areas. Turn to us for all of your legal needs regarding personal injury, criminal defense, divorce, family law, estate planning and administration, civil litigation, education law and employment law throughout Pennsylvania.

Whether you need help getting full and fair compensation after an accident, protecting your rights in the face of a criminal charge, or handling another legal issue, we are prepared to help. Our legal team comprises experienced and passionate attorneys who treat their clients with compassion and respect.

Experienced Legal Counsel, Reasonable Fees

Many people think they cannot afford a good lawyer. Our accomplished legal team has over 60 years of combined experience and a great track record. We are proud to charge fair fees for our legal services. As skilled negotiators, we can often save our clients money and time by resolving their cases outside of court. We are also proven trial attorneys, and we're prepared to fight for you in court when it is in your best interests.

We handle personal injury cases on contingency, which means we won't charge any lawyer's fees unless we win a financial recovery for you.

To learn more about our services and our legal fees, please call us today to schedule a free legal consultation. Call 717-925-8654 to reach our Coatesville office.
